This song originated from the 12/29/02 Techno I-Man intro jam. This particular I-Man is traditionally known as the "Gangster I-Man" and the jam is found on the Trancefusion Radio Broadcast #2 under the track title "Gangster Jam".

Up until the Starland run in February of 2007, this jam was never played again. It was teased in the 12/29/04 Basis for a Day intro jam, but a "full" version was never played. It was included on the wheel at Starland and was eventually landed on (thanks Julia!) which lead to its revival. It is rumored that its comeback, along with its second showing the last night of the Starland run, is a good indication that it might be on the upcoming new album, although this is only speculation.
